item.title: Schade + Rouge Gorge + Weird Ugly Fish + Sheik Anorak
item.description: Claws of Saurtopia & Income Tax Refund present Schade [new wave disco psych] Rouge Gorge [odd synth pop] Weird Ugly Fish [drums’n’synths] Sheik Anorak [noisy exp. improv]
